items.title: Sources: United approach Carrick, Solskjaer
items.summary: Manchester United have held "early-stage informal talks" with several potential interim managers, including Ole Gunnar Solskjaer and Michael Carrick, sources have told ESPN.

items.title: Messi prefers ownership to coaching after career
items.summary: Lionel Messi said Tuesday that he does not see a future for himself as a manager, but would like to be a club owner someday.

items.title: Manchester City lose Dias for up to six weeks but book in Semenyo medical
items.summary: Bournemouth‚Äôs Semenyo due for medical on Thursday Academy graduate Alleyne recalled amid injury crisis Manchester City will be without R√∫ben Dias for up to six weeks with a hamstring injury, exacerbating Pep Guardiola‚Äôs defensive injury crisis and leading the head coach to admit the club may enter the transfer market. The Crystal Palace captain, Marc Gu√©hi, is of interest. City are contemplating a bid for Gu√©hi and are close to completing a move for the forward Antoine Semenyo, who is due for a medical on Thursday after playing a final game for Bournemouth on Wednesday at home against Tottenham. City have agreed to pay Semenyo‚Äôs almost ¬£65m release clause. Continue reading...

items.title: Uitblinker Summerville kan niet voorkomen dat positie Nuno nog meer wankelt
items.summary: Het einde van Nuno Espirito Santo als manager van West Ham United lijkt nabij. Zijn ploeg verloor de degradatiekraker van zijn oude club Nottingham Forest: 1-2.

items.title: Sparta lijkt strijd om Van Crooij te winnen na onderhoud in Venlo
items.summary: Vito van Crooij (29) gaat - mits er geen calamiteiten plaatsvinden - aan de slag bij Sparta Rotterdam. De ploeg pikt de vleugelaanvaller op bij NEC, bevestigen ingewijden. Daarmee is de opvolger van de aan AZ verkochte Ayoub Oufkir bijna binnen.

items.title: Oliver Glasner set to decide on Crystal Palace contract and hints at Gu√©hi sale
items.summary: Resolution has been delayed by packed fixture schedule Manager says defender may be sold for the right price Oliver Glasner expects to decide in the coming weeks whether he will sign a new contract at Crystal Palace and has said Marc Gu√©hi could be sold this month if his ‚Äúthreshold‚Äù is met. Glasner is the bookmakers‚Äô early favourite to be the permanent replacement for Ruben Amorim at Manchester United. The Austrian‚Äôs contract expires this summer and the ambitious 51-year-old is understood to be open then to joining United or another big club. Continue reading...

items.title: Nottingham Forest add to West Ham‚Äôs woes as Gibbs-White seals late fightback win
items.summary: For a while it seemed the only thing that Nottingham Forest were going to get right was show safe hands when West Ham passed them the Premier League‚Äôs crisis baton. Sean Dyche‚Äôs side were jeered off after an awful first half but an unlikely turnaround earned them their first win since 14 December thanks to an equaliser from Nicol√°s Dom√≠nguez and a controversial late penalty from Morgan Gibbs-White. It was a goal that stopped the mood of the relegation fight shifting away from Forest. This was the night when it had to change for West Ham. A first win in 10 games would have had them closing in on 17th-placed Forest, who were looking at a fifth consecutive defeat after conceding a poor early goal, but there is no respite for Nuno Esp√≠rito Santo at the moment. His side simply cannot defend ‚Äì West Ham are yet to keep a clean sheet since hiring the Portuguese manager in September ‚Äì and slipped seven points below Forest after a VAR review led to Alphonse Areola being penalised for catching Gibbs-White when he tried to punch a cross away. Continue reading...

items.title: Van Persie wil na wisselen van aanvoerder niets weten van spijt
items.summary: Robin van Persie benoemde nieuwkomer Sem Steijn aan het begin van dit seizoen als de aanvoerder van Feyenoord, maar na een paar maanden heeft de coach besloten om de band door te geven aan Timon Wellenreuther. Dat betekent niet dat Van Persie spijt heeft van de keuze die hij een paar maanden geleden nam.

items.title: Dit is het schema van de kwartfinale van de Afrika Cup
items.summary: De achtste finales van de Afrika Cup zitten erop, wat betekent dat het tijd is voor de kwartfinales. Na twee rustdagen gaat het toernooi vrijdag verder. We zetten de wedstrijden op een rij.

items.title: Amad Diallo powers C√¥te d‚ÄôIvoire past Burkina Faso to set up Afcon clash with Egypt
items.summary: Last 16: C√¥te d‚ÄôIvoire 3-0 Burkina Faso Heavyweight quarter-final meeting with Egypt awaits Amad Diallo scored one goal and created another to continue his excellent form in Morocco as the defending champions C√¥te d‚ÄôIvoire eased past Burkina Faso 3-0 in their Africa Cup of Nations last-16 game in Marrakech on Tuesday. C√¥te d‚ÄôIvoire will face the seven-time winners Egypt in a heavyweight quarter-final in Agadir on Saturday, a repeat of the 2006 decider where the north African side triumphed on penalties after a 0-0 draw.
